#summary Use case: 021 Add songs to static playlist

=== Purpose ===
Add one or more songs to an existing static playlist 
=== Actors ===
    * Library Maintainer
    * Music Listener

=== Description ===

<br/> *Narrative 1:* The user (music explorer) is browsing its collection by a
given type of entity and he selects one or more songs that do not belong to a playlist. The user is offered the option to add the selected songs to an existing static playlist.
answer. The actor is offered an action to "delete this unused entity".
<br/> *Narrative 2*: The user (music explorer) selects one or more songs that belong to a playlist. The user is offered the option to add the selected songs to another existing static playlist.
